comments:
When I select Customize View from the view menu of the Project Explorer, I get the following NPE. It appears to have been caused by the fix for bug 153924.

java.lang.NullPointerException

This was due to a resource synchronization issue in my local workspace. The fix was to release the image as well as tighten up NavigatorPlugin.
